alice.tucson.api

Interface OrdinarySynchACC

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RootACC
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DefaultACC, EnhancedACC, EnhancedSynchACC, SynchACC
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ACCProxyAgentSide

    public interface OrdinarySynchACC
extends RootACC
    Agent Coordination Context enabling interaction with the Ordinary Tuple Space (basic Linda-like primitives) and enacting a BLOCKING behavior from the agent's perspective. This means that whichever is the Linda operation invoked (either suspensive or predicative) the agent stub will block waiting for its completion (communicated by the node side).

        exit

    • Method Detail

      • out

        ITucsonOperation out(java.lang.Object tid,
                   LogicTuple tuple,
                   java.lang.Long ms)
                     throws TucsonOperationNotPossibleException,
                            UnreachableNodeException,
                            OperationTimeOutException
        Out Linda primitive, synchronous version. Inserts the specified tuple in the given target tuplecentre, waiting the completion answer from the TuCSoN node for a maximum time specified in ms timeunit. Notice that TuCSoN out primitive assumes the ORDERED version of this primitive, hence the tuple is SUDDENLY injected in the target space (if the primitive successfully completes)
        Parameters:
        tid - Target TuCSoN tuplecentre id tid
        tuple - Tuple to be emitted in the target tuplecentre
        ms - Maximum waiting time tolerated by the callee TuCSoN Agent
        Returns:
        The Logic Tuple resulting from the completion of the primitive
        Throws:
        TucsonOperationNotPossibleException
        UnreachableNodeException
        OperationTimeOutException
        See Also:
        TucsonTupleCentreId

      • nop

        ITucsonOperation nop(java.lang.Object tid,
                   LogicTuple tuple,
                   java.lang.Long ms)
                     throws TucsonOperationNotPossibleException,
                            UnreachableNodeException,
                            OperationTimeOutException
        Nop Linda primitive, synchronous version. Checks absence of the specified tuple in the given target tuplecentre, waiting the completion answer from the TuCSoN node for a maximum time specified in ms timeunit. Semantics is NOT SUSPENSIVE: if a tuple is found to match the given template, a failure completion answer is forwarded to the TuCSoN Agent exploiting this proxy
        Parameters:
        tid - Target TuCSoN tuplecentre id tid
        tuple - Tuple to be checked for absence from the target tuplecentre
        ms - Maximum waiting time tolerated by the callee TuCSoN Agent
        Returns:
        The Logic Tuple resulting from the completion of the primitive
        Throws:
        TucsonOperationNotPossibleException
        UnreachableNodeException
        OperationTimeOutException
        See Also:
        TucsonTupleCentreId

      • set

        ITucsonOperation set(java.lang.Object tid,
                   LogicTuple tuple,
                   java.lang.Long ms)
                     throws TucsonOperationNotPossibleException,
                            UnreachableNodeException,
                            OperationTimeOutException
        Set TuCSoN primitive, synchronous version. Inserts all the tuples in the specified list in the given target tuplecentre, waiting the completion answer from the TuCSoN node for a maximum time specified in ms timeunit.
        Parameters:
        tid - Target TuCSoN tuplecentre id tid
        tuple - The logic tuple containing the list of all the tuples to be injected
        ms - Maximum waiting time tolerated by the callee TuCSoN Agent
        Returns:
        The Logic Tuple resulting from the completion of the primitive
        Throws:
        TucsonOperationNotPossibleException
        UnreachableNodeException
        OperationTimeOutException
        See Also:
        TucsonTupleCentreId

      • get

        ITucsonOperation get(java.lang.Object tid,
                   java.lang.Long ms)
                     throws TucsonOperationNotPossibleException,
                            UnreachableNodeException,
                            OperationTimeOutException
        Get TuCSoN primitive, synchronous version. Reads (w/o removing) all the tuples in the given target tuplecentre, waiting the completion answer from the TuCSoN node for a maximum time specified in ms timeunit. Semantics is NOT SUSPENSIVE: is the tuple space is empty, a failure completion answer is forwarded to the TuCSoN Agent exploiting this proxy
        Parameters:
        tid - Target TuCSoN tuplecentre id tid
        ms - Maximum waiting time tolerated by the callee TuCSoN Agent
        Returns:
        The list of Logic Tuples resulting from the completion of the primitive
        Throws:
        TucsonOperationNotPossibleException
        UnreachableNodeException
        OperationTimeOutException
        See Also:
        TucsonTupleCentreId
